name: HappyThoughts
0:
”Alexa, open Happy Thoughts”
”Alexa, ask Happy Thoughts to cheer me up”
”Alexa, tell Happy Thoughts to encourage me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: happy thoughts
des: Life isn't easy, but it gets better when you're thinking happy thoughts! Let this skill inspire you to live your best life every day with a quick burst of positive energy.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
